title: FS: T206 Frank Isbell White Sox - Raw
author: IronHorse2130

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Frank Isbell White Sox - Raw
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell this ungraded Isbell T206 card.  Card has nice eye appeal with obvious wear.  Pinhole above his head and what appears to be several small fountain pen spots.  

$15.00 including US shipping.  Please email me at [url]benlevinsohn@gmail.com[/url] or PM me if interested.  Thanks!
